billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

title: Enables the state dormitory authority to construct and finance dormitories and related facilities for the St. Andrew's Foundation
summary: Enables the state dormitory authority to construct and finance dormitories and related facilities for the St. Andrew's Foundation, the Scottish Society of Hudson's Valley, Ltd.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1642

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   January 10, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen. BRESLIN -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Corporations,  Authorities
         and Commissions

       AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the financing
         and  construction  of  certain facilities for the St. Andrew's Founda-
         tion, the Scottish Society of Hudson's Valley, Ltd.

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Paragraph  (b)  of  subdivision  2 of section 1676 of the
    2  public authorities law is amended by adding a new undesignated  subpara-
    3  graph to read as follows:
    4    ST.  ANDREW'S  FOUNDATION,  THE  SCOTTISH  SOCIETY OF HUDSON'S VALLEY,
    5  LTD., A NOT-FOR-PROFIT  CORPORATION,  FOR  THE  ACQUISITION,  FINANCING,
    6  REFINANCING,  DESIGN,  CONSTRUCTION, IMPROVEMENT, RENOVATION, EQUIPPING,
    7  FURNISHING OR OTHERWISE  PROVIDING  FOR  FACILITIES  WITHIN  THE  HUDSON
    8  VALLEY.
    9    S  2.  Subdivision  1 of section 1680 of the public authorities law is
   10  amended by adding a new undesignated paragraph to read as follows:
   11    ST. ANDREW'S FOUNDATION, THE SCOTTISH SOCIETY OF HUDSON'S VALLEY, LTD.
   12    S 3. Any contracts entered into by the dormitory authority pursuant to
   13  this act shall be deemed state contracts within the meaning of that term
   14  as set forth in article 15-A of the executive  law,  and  the  authority
   15  shall  be  deemed, for the purposes of this act, a contracting agency as
   16  that term is used in such article.
   17    S 4. This act shall take effect immediately.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD06156-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the financing and construction of certain facilities for the St. Andrew's Foundation, the Scottish Society of Hudson's Valley, Ltd.
